import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../../components/rating/Rating' import { products } from '../../data/products' function SingleProductPage() { const {id} = useParams() const product = products.find(prod => prod.id === +id) // parseInt(param) === +(param) return (

{product.title}

${product.price}
Quantity
